body.name: INFANS 2 in 1 Baby Stroller, One Hand Quick-Fold Foldable Pushchair Reversible Bassinet Pram, Newborn Stroller with Aluminum Frame 5 Point Seat Belt Adjustable Canopy for Toddler Infant (Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins.
features: 【REVERSIBLE & ADJUSTABLE INFANT STROLLER 】 INFANS convertible baby stroller can reorient the seat so that the baby can enjoy the view when facing outside and the mother can keep an eye on the baby when facing inside. Push and pull rod support 3 gear adjustments. The adjustable footstool and folding canopy make the stroller easier to use and more valuable, making it an indispensable tool for moms. The seat can be inclined to lie down and can sit two gear adjustments.

【SIMPLE ONE-HAND FOLDING】Air rod folding, more time and effort saving than general cart folding. With a foldable design, this folding baby stroller can be folded in one step in a short time with a simple press, and is easy to unroll. Brought great convenience to receive, go out travel can be placed in the trunk of the car, when not needed, can be stored in the corner of the home. Folding size: 21.5" X 18.5" X 31 "(L X W X H).

【PREMIUM QUALITY】Our infant stroller has a durable aluminum frame that can be used in everyday life for a long time. In addition, the stroller uses safe, non-toxic and breathable linen material. The handrail and handle are made of PU leather, which is breathable, waterproof and not dirty. The seat of the baby stroller is designed with a hard back, which can better protect the normal development of the baby's spine and prevent the baby's delicate spine from being damaged.

【SAFE STRUCTURAL DESIGN】1.The design of 2 rear wheels locking in one step improves the overall safety of the compact travel stroller. 2.The wheels of the folding stroller are all designed with shock absorption, which makes it safe and reliable to run smoothly on various roads. The front wheels of the cart can rotate 360 degrees and can be adjusted at will. 3. The seat is equipped with an adjustable five-point seat belt to prevent the baby from slipping off the cart.

【ELABORATE DETIALS】1.A detachable large capacity storage basket is a good helper to go out. The mother can place the baby's toys and a variety of baby supplies.2. Three adjustable awning, can be more weather conditions at will to adjust, protect your baby from UV. 3.There is a peek-a-boo window on the roof so parents can keep an eye on the baby. 4.Detachable cushion cover for easy cleaning and replacement, to create a comfortable and clean environment for the baby.
body.description: Why do you choose INFANS 2 in 1 Baby Stroller? INFANS 2-in-1 convertible baby stroller can reorient the seat so that the baby can enjoy the view when facing outside and the mother can keep an eye on the baby when facing inside. Push and pull rod support 3 gear adjustments. The adjustable footstool and folding canopy make the stroller easier to use and more valuable, making it an indispensable tool for moms. The seat can be inclined to lie down and can sit two gear adjustments. If you're looking for a lightweight stroller, don't miss INFANS! Features: The shock-resistant wheels can be adapted to any road surface Adjustable seats and shed, seats can also be two-way conversion The 5-point seat belt prevents the baby from slipping off the baby stroller Solid structure and light aluminum frame, breathable and comfortable linen material The fast one-handed folding design makes the stroller easy to store and carry The pull bar can be adjusted in three gears so mom can find a comfortable position to use the compact stroller Adjustable foot pedals and comfortable hard back provide a comfortable lying experience to protect the baby's spine The compact traveling stroller's large storage basket has plenty of space to store all baby supplies and essentials for your baby Specification: Product Weight:22.8 lbs Weight Capacity:27.5 lbs Applicable Age: 6-36month Material: Aluminum + Linen Material+PU Fold Size: 21.5" X 18.5" X 31 " (L x W x H) Product Size: 22 " X 36 " X42 " (L x W x H)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the height
reviews.reviewText: I love that this stroller is high and my toddler can see everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a good stroller but a little heavy. My baby is 3 months would of been great if it laid back a little more other then that it's good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is wonderful. It's sleek, sturdy and easy to store. I love that it's versatile, in that it's forward or rear facing and it's easy to switch between the two. We're fairly tall so I especially love the height. The wheels are great they are bigger than most strollers out there which makes steering seamless on all terrains, we've tried. It seems like they are similar to a jogging stroller's wheels. The storage space underneath, is decent and it's easy to grab things from there. I really recommend this stroller. It's not a brand I recognize and it was on the cheaper end so I was skeptical but I'm in love with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent stroller but...
reviews.reviewText: The craftsmanship is questionable. The insert for the safety bar broke after one use and the seller could not replace it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Good quality , Very sturdy. Not a light weight stroller.Customer service is good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good baby stroller
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 9 months old baby. It could switch the seat direction very easily. And it's compact when folded. Easy to fit in the trunk. The seat had two levels of position. Very recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact when folded
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to fold and unfold, when it's folded, it could be easily to put in the trunk. Another thing is that it has two directions (forward and backwards) which is also easy to change. Really recommeded.
